sys_soap_message_function.envelope: <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:m="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <SOAP-ENV:Body> <UpdateSubscription xmlns="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema"> <!-- nillable--> <user xsi:type="xsd:string">String</user> <!-- nillable--> <password xsi:type="xsd:string">String</password> <!-- nillable--> <clientTimestamp xsi:type="xsd:string">String</clientTimestamp> <!-- nillable--> <clientIP xsi:type="xsd:string">String</clientIP> <!-- nillable--> <clientOSUser xsi:type="xsd:string">String</clientOSUser> <!-- nillable--> <company xsi:type="xsd:string">String</company> <subscriptionIdentifier xsi:type="xsd:long">0</subscriptionIdentifier> <!-- nillable--> <subscription xsi:type="m:SoapSubscriptionParameter"> <!-- nillable--> <deviceTypeOverrides xsi:type="m:SoapDeviceTypeOverridesParameter"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <type xsi:type="xsd:string">String</type> </deviceTypeOverrides> <!-- nillable--> <escalationOverride xsi:type="xsd:string">String</escalationOverride> <!-- nillable--> <ignoreDeviceDelays xsi:type="xsd:string">String</ignoreDeviceDelays> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">String</name> <!-- nillable--> <notificationDelay xsi:type="xsd:string">String</notificationDelay> <!-- nillable--> <overrideDeviceSeverity xsi:type="xsd:string">String</overrideDeviceSeverity> <!-- nillable--> <overrideTimeframe xsi:type="xsd:string">String</overrideTimeframe> <!-- nillable--> <predicates xsi:type="m:SoapPredicatesParameter"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <listPredicate xsi:type="m:SoapListPredicateParameter"> <anyValue xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</anyValue> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">String</name> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <values xsi:type="m:SoapListPredicateValue"> <!-- nillable--> <value xsi:type="xsd:string">String</value> </values> </listPredicate> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <textPredicate xsi:type="m:SoapTextPredicate"> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">String</name> <!-- nillable--> <operator xsi:type="xsd:string">String</operator> <!-- nillable--> <value xsi:type="xsd:string">String</value> </textPredicate> </predicates> <!-- nillable--> <recipientList xsi:type="m:SoapRecipientList"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <recipient xsi:type="m:SoapRecipient"> <!-- nillable--> <targetName xsi:type="xsd:string">String</targetName> <!-- nillable--> <type xsi:type="xsd:string">String</type> </recipient> </recipientList> <!-- nillable--> <subscriptionTimeframe xsi:type="m:SoapSubscriptionTimeframe"> <!-- nillable--> <dayList xsi:type="m:SoapStringDayList"> <!-- nillable--> <friday xsi:type="xsd:string">String</friday> <!-- nillable--> <monday xsi:type="xsd:string">String</monday> <!-- nillable--> <saturday xsi:type="xsd:string">String</saturday> <!-- nillable--> <sunday xsi:type="xsd:string">String</sunday> <!-- nillable--> <thursday xsi:type="xsd:string">String</thursday> <!-- nillable--> <tuesday xsi:type="xsd:string">String</tuesday> <!-- nillable--> <wednesday xsi:type="xsd:string">String</wednesday> </dayList> <!-- nillable--> <durationHours xsi:type="xsd:string">String</durationHours> <!-- nillable--> <durationMinutes xsi:type="xsd:string">String</durationMinutes> <!-- nillable--> <startDate xsi:type="xsd:string">String</startDate> <!-- nillable--> <startTime xsi:type="xsd:string">String</startTime> <!-- nillable--> <timeZone xsi:type="xsd:string">String</timeZone> </subscriptionTimeframe> <!-- nillable--> <supervisorList xsi:type="m:SoapSupervisorList"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <supervisor xsi:type="m:SoapSupervisor"> <!-- nillable--> <targetName xsi:type="xsd:string">String</targetName> </supervisor> </supervisorList> </subscription> </UpdateSubscription> </SOAP-ENV:Body> </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
